results.abstract: At age 105, Robert Marchand, a French amateur cyclist, is fitter than most 50-year-olds, and appears to be getting fitter with age.

media.caption: Robert Marchand, age 105, in Paris on Jan. 5, 2017, a day after setting a new one-hour cycling record.

results.title: Lessons on Aging Well, From a 105-Year-Old Cyclist

results.abstract: In a season rife with demonstrations, Republican legislators in at least 16 states have filed bills to make protests more orderly or to toughen penalties.
results.byline: By MITCH SMITH and MICHAEL WINES

results.abstract: A Hong Kong carrier has introduced a beer brewed to taste good at high altitudes, since noise, dry air and plastic cutlery affect our sense of taste.
